title: Manipulate Arrays With push Method
content: An easy way to append data to the end of an array is via the push() method.
The push() method takes one or more arguments and appends them to the end of the array, in order in which they appear. It turnes the new length of the array.
arr1 now has the value [1, 2, 3, 4. 5] and arr2 has the value ['Stimpson', 'J', 'cat', ['happy', 'joy']]

exercises.instruction: Push ['dog', 3] onto the end of the myArray variable
